content.text:
# 2012 President's Cup (tennis) – Men's doubles__disambig_1

Konstantin Kravchuk Denys Molchanov
| runner =  Karol Beck Kamil Čapkovič
| score = 6–4, 6–3
}}
Konstantin Kravchuk and Denys Molchanov successfully defended their title, defeating Karol Beck and Kamil Čapkovič 6–4, 6–3 in the final.
Seeds
Konstantin Kravchuk /  Denys Molchanov (champions)
#  Andrey Golubev /  Yuri Schukin (quarterfinals)
#  Yuki Bhambri /  Divij Sharan (semifinals)
#  James Cluskey /  Fabrice Martin (semifinals)
}}
